PackageInfo.name: Composite.Tools.PackageCreator
PackageInfo.author: Composite A/S
PackageInfo.description: Allows users to export website data (pages, templates, page types, media files, functions, data types, data items, flat files, localizations) to packages and reuse them on other sites.Allows users to export website data (pages, templates, page types, media files, functions, data types, data items, flat files, localizations) to packages and reuse them on other sites.
